title: Static sound and snapshots do not save on my phone
text: When you turn the speaker on, all you hear is a static noise. I did the firmware update - same thing. Also, when I monitor the camera from work through my phone and take a snapshot it says picture is saved in my album but when you try to look for it, it's not there.

title: Rookie App
text: I recently bought a Trendnet cloud camera and after installing it I realized I can only use this Trendnet app to view it from my phone - other apps don't work with the cloud cameras. This app is so poorly made it is almost useless. It crashes all the time, most times you press a button (like save) and it ignores the command, it has no access to camera pre-sets (which is the whole point of the app), you cannot toggle between day and night mode (so at night it doesn't work at all), the image is distorted in some phone orientations, and the list goes on. Unfortunately I bought this camera and it seems I'm stuck with this useless app - never buying Trendnet again!

title: Good Value
text: The app works fine once setup.  The setup process is a bit cumbersome and directions not as clear as they could be.  I use the camera to monitor my vacation home remotely and it has been a good value for me over the past two years.  I did try to setup the motion activation feature inside the house but it was unreliable sending false motion sensing emails almost every minute though there was nothing in the house.  The remote management capabilities work very well and allow almost total configuration and management of the camera.

title: Good potential, just not quite there yet
text:
This app is great because you can see the camera from anywhere! I love that feature!!!! 
The reason I gave it 3 stars is because the tech within the app lacks in details. 
- the date/time is incorrect and doesn't automatically correct itself
- it's very cumbersome to get the initial set up
- instructions aren't that clear
- I don't like the fact that you can't save the pixelation from the iPhone 
- the actual app seems like it's from the 1990s, not 2015. I know we didn't have apps in the 90s but that is how I feel about the user friendliness and the layout. 

So in a nutshell. It's great to see baby from wherever on your smartphone. The design/layout/user friendless needs major improvement.

title: NO SUPPORT
text: I just bought these and I‚Äôve fought over 20mins trying to get support on setting it up. The app opens and wants me to create a new password but it won‚Äôt let me click on it to do it. This is ridiculous and obviously a huge waste of money. Has TRENDnet just decided to let the app fall through the cracks or do they just not care about customer service?!?!?! What a waste!!!

title: DONT BUY!
text: I purchased two TRENDNet TV-IP743SIC cameras to use indoor in my apartment. Little did I know that there is ZERO customer support, Zero compatibility with their 5 year old mobile app (I have an iPhone) which renders the cameras I bought useless.  Don‚Äôt bother calling or emailing tech support.  They don‚Äôt answer and don‚Äôt reply.

title: Good App
text: Very clear image, the zoom and audio does not work but overall it's a good picture.

title: Horrible-do not bother
text: I just bought two cameras that require this app.  The app does not work.  It hasn‚Äôt received any updates in years and likely isn‚Äôt compatible with the latest iOS.

title: Stopped working
text: App stopped working in iOS 13.5 and also doesn't work in iOS 13.6.  please fix. I open it and 5 seconds later it closes.

title: Doesn't work on iOS 9
text: Crashes when accessing the camera in iOS 9. Will update when it gets fixed.

title: Can‚Äôt Set Up.
text: The app won‚Äôt allow me to set up a password. When I try to set up the the camera manually it cannot connect.

title: Cameras
text: It works find üëç

title: Poor app... useless!
text:
The worst app ever!
Is just garbage don‚Äôt even think about use this cams TRENDnet or this super basic app!
Useless...

title: Ridiculous
text: Super outdated app, keep crashing

title: Doesn't work
text: Doesn't work at all

title: Waste of time
text: Will not set up on Mac.

title: Pretty good but needs more controls
text:
It allows me to view my cameras but the cameras keep sending me emails all day long saying there is movement when there is not. I get aprox. 25 emails a day... All of them show an empty room. 
Also, a greatly needed improvement to this app would be having the ability to easily turn on and off motion alert emails. You have to go through your desk top (no ability on app) and go through 5 to 10 different steps to get into each camera to turn off the motion anytime you want to turn your system on and off. There is no easy way to turn motion alert on and off on the system.
It is my biggest complaint about this entire set up. You should be able to just go through your app and quickly turn the cameras on and off promotion alert. I hope they update this. I may have to send my camera back due to the constant emailing when there's actually no motion. And no I don't have any ghost in my house. Lol

title: Works well
text: It has done a good job of allowing me quick access to monitor my house.  I am using an iPad2.  The control allows fairly easy aiming the camera at different places.  It is definitely easier to use than the rest of the software and set-up involved in the system.  now if I could just get it to feed my fish...

title: Howard
text: This is a great ap. First when I started 2 months ago it did not work sometimes but after I upgraded my internet modem it works like a charm. Greatly suggest it. Anybody can help me please how to hook up cameras at two different houses at two different cities. Thanks Trendnetcloud. I am planning to buy more Trendnetcloud cameras.

title: I like it a lot. Very few crashes,
text: Great app for monitoring your camera. Not many crashes, responsive and useful with multiple cameras. Camera quality could always be better with reflective night vision. Otherwise I am satisfied. Five stars for you!

title: Works fine
text: This app works just fine for the camera it supports. What is frustrating is that you have to use multiple apps if you have older trendnet cameras. They should find a way to make these apps work with the computer software or older trendnet cameras to see them in one place. Ie. one stop shopping

title: Downgraded app
text:
Still broken - "long press screen" feature to use presets does not work. All previously mentioned issues persist. 

- 
Lost the ability to use preset camera positions. Now forced to use smaller manual controls to slowly move camera. Lost the ability to set the camera's movement speed so manual movement is slower yet. Manual controls are reversed for cameras mounted inverted with image flipped. Connecting to the camera even seems to take longer now. Update was a downgrade.

title: Empty message on "Where do I find ID!'
text:
I am sure this is a great app, as are the other apps of this developer! 
At this moment, I can not access a camera since I do not know where to find the ID. On my "Where to find ID!" screen , there is nothing showing.
Please help me finding the Camera ID.

title: Works pretty good
text: Not too tough to add to my wifi network , sharp picture. My camera doesn't have infrared but with a single light on I can see if the kids are sneaking into the refrigerator at night! I wish it had movement sensors and ability to record upon movement.

title: Works much better now.
text: Audio bug is fixed and the app seems better. I still am having issues getting to presets and I don't like the new Pan Tilt control. Half the time I end up looking somewhere else. I used the app to monitor my house while I was in Mexico last week and it worked out well.

title: iPhone 5/4s update image stretched
text:
After the latest update, supposedly for iPhone 5/5s, the image from all my cameras is visibly stretched in landscape mode. Wish I could back out the update.

Feb 4, 2014:  still no update to the aspect ratio problem. It is not acceptable to alter the aspect ratio when switching modes.

title: Love the app but not the last update
text: I love this app! But after the last update I have to close it completely before I can change cameras or even look at the same camera a second time. Never had that problem before the update

title: Works great
text: I'm running this on a couple i devices.  Works great.  Setup requires the device number a little clumsy on setup, no problems after you get it up and running

title: No sound in latest update
text: Recent update seems to have broken the sound feature. Please fix soon. Thanks.

title: Static in Audio Still a PROBLEM
text:
I have called Trendnet Support, spent untold time with them, only to have them admit the audio background static is a KNOWN problem and they have no sure fire fix.

Had they been HONEST in their advertising and specs, I would have passed on this camera!

They have my money, it doesn‚Äôt work as advertised totally‚Ä¶.and companies always wonder why Class ACTION LAWSUITS materialize, and they feel ‚Äúvictimized‚Äù by attorneys and the courts, when it is their own failures and greed in not replacing or fixing these problems.

TrendNet obviously does not give a crap about it‚Äôs customers.

title: Good on WIFI, bad outside
text: This app is nice while you are inside your firewall. However, once outside your network and trying to see your cameras it's spotty at best. I have tried this multiple times with full 4G and no luck 90% of the time.

title: Used to be a good app
text: This app used to work great until the recent update (IPhone 5). Since the update I can no longer view my camera from outside my wifi connection. Customer support is horrible you'll wait 30 minutes on hold to speak with "Bob" from India who learned English yesterday. Good luck.

title: Still crap!  Can only watch for 5 mins
text: Thanks for fixing the sound problem in your last update, but what's with the five minute time limit on watching the video stream??  We spend a lot of money on your cameras and now you limit us on how long we can view the video...

title: Needs Work
text: This is a good app, but it keeps dropping my cameras login info.  I have to re-input the login information at least 3 times per week.  Overall, good, but could be a lot better.

title: Basic
text: App works well as far as it goes.  Couldn't get much more basic.  Fairly reliable.  Needs support to view multiple cameras on one screen.

title: Camera software
text: Works as expected

title: Baby cam
text: Great app to use with our camera. We use it to monitor baby boy in his room at night.

title: Works sometime
text: I use the app on my ipad2 and my Motorola g cell phone. Works better on the iPad. At first it was working perfectly. Now it's a bit annoying and only works 33% of the time.

title: Pretty Useful
text: The app is good/useful for the cost, but getting everything set up is not user friendly.

title: Great labeling in the product but it's vapor ware
text: The advertising in the box suggests this app. This app suggests an id under the camera. It's a web address suggesting the MAC address as part of it. Problem is it's not there under the camera as the app insists. Web shows camera is supported. Dead end. Will not work.

title: I thought an update was supposed to be an improvement???
text: The original app wasn't very good but the new one is just bare-bones. The audio rarely works, the settings button does not work, and the preset positions were removed! The mobile all needs to more closely mimic the online app.

title: Slow and clunky
text: Very slow connection to cameras, huge lag. App crashes constantly. Limited control options. Poorly laid out UI.

title: Used to work....
text: Don't understand what happened. Worked on a 4S, 5S, iPad Mini and full size iPad. Now when activated it brings up the cameras in the list but when you choose a camera, the app closes. Trendnet is better than this. Where's the fix?????

title: Horrible now!  So disappointed.
text: Completely useless app now. I liked this before even though the audio didn't work at least I had visual now I have nothing. It won't even show the camera in the app any longer.

title: Great!
text: Installed and works like a charm. Great to be able to quickly see what is happening with the dogs.

title: Unreliable performance
text:
I run another camera program alongside this one.  The third party software works every time.  Trendnet's software gives an n01 error frequently when attempting to connect to the camera.

Poor quality software.

title: Works
text: No issues

title: Freedom
text: I can keep an eye on my home any time anywhere.

title: Doesn't work!
text:
The app does not work any longer outside of my network.  Same issues as other reviewers.  

Bought 5 cameras going to return them all. 
Do not waste your time or money with trendnet cameras.

title: Simple, easy to set up
text: Simple, easy to set up

title: Update üòí üëé
text:
Still no presets and no motion adjustment.
May 3, 2014

Slower camera load.
Lost presets which was plus on the initial version.
Lost speed adjust also from the initial version
Icon is not HD

Overall company took more than one step BACK!!!üò°

Wish cam would record at least 10 sec clips and send to email.

title: Great nursery monitor.
text: I use this mounted on the ceiling of my 1 year old's room, and love it. Great night vision.

title: Works
text: Thx Trendnet works great on i pad and i phone 5 and my mba

title: App crashes after new IOS 7.1 update
text: This app does not work anymore after I updated to IOS 7.1.  TRENDnet, I spent a lot of money on your camera and now your app is useless.  Please update you app so it is compatible with IOS 7.1.

title: Terrible update
text: Completely useless now. I click on the camera I want to view and it crashes and goes to the iPhone home screen.

title: Auto lock fix please?
text: Please fix the iphone auto lock function. I have to constantly turn off auto lock when im watching my baby sleep.

title: Lost audio with new update
text: Please fix the audio ASAP! It is the key feature we use with our camera and we no longer have it with this update.

title: Come on this is worse!!!!!!
text: Lost what little features it had from the last version. Would be nice if I had a way to shut off motion detection too. Please correct soon.

title: Bad update
text: Lost pan & tilt adjustments. Now have to move the camera in small amounts. By the time I get the camera to one side, the "intruder" would hear the camera & leave. Bring these adjustments back!

title: No LTE
text: Use to work fine, but the latest update will not work on LTE. Works fine with wifi.

title: Simple
text: Easy to use and set-up , the app works as good as the camera very simple but good.

title: App just crashes now
text: Click on camera and it just goes to the iPhone home screen. Broken on iPhone 6 plus and iPad Air.

title: Dissapponted :(
text: App and product are both awful. Rarely connects to phone. Very complicated to use and is non-functional.

title: False advertising.
text: Bought trendnet camera with the understanding that the sound worked in the app. Sound is a necessity.

title: Awful app
text: It doesn't work most of the time. I thinking seriously to returne the camera. It's a shame.

title: Lost functions in new update
text: Lost preset camera positions in this new version. I want the old version back!

title: Worthless
text: App always crashes, every time. Big waste.

title: Really bad update
text: Worked good before last update. Lost preset positions, no sound, no mic

title: Nice
text: Works perfect

title: No audio
text: Lost audio in update. iPhone 5

title: CRAP!!!
text: This is the worse software ever!!!!

title: Great App
text: Works great.

title: Can‚Äôt complete setup
text: I cannot complete setup process on iPhone, Android or laptop. Every time I get to the pint to change my password the app freezes. Customer service was of no help. Emailed support and waiting for response.

title: The worst! Unable to set up.
text: Have been trying to set it up multiple times but it won‚Äôt allow me to create a new username nor password. The page freezes. ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Features not working, terrible audio, bad service
text: Been trying to use this app for months. Non of the presets work since the ios 7 update. Aspect ration on landscape view is totally stretched. Features advertised are simply not available. Actual camera Audio is horrible and not usable. Please don't get this for a baby monitor. It will disappoint. I'm a systems engineer and have done extensive troubleshooting on every aspect from hardware tweaks to software adjustments and wi-if signal isolations. Products are simply defective and app has 15% of its features actually working.

title: So far, so good.
text: I have this on both my iPad and iPhone and it has worked well. Have been using it about 3 weeks and while on vacation. I have been able to connect 98% of the time and the quality if the images it captures are great. Live look-ins are pretty crisp and movement is not even that choppy. Overall not bad considering I bought the camera on special for $19.99 after rebate.

title: Worked well before iOS 7
text: Had this working well could access from wifi and cell. Since iOS 7 upgrade it's not working. If an update is needed please do it
